section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: Subchapter I of this chapter shall not apply to a contract entered into or automatically renewed before March 13, 2019, but it shall apply to automatic renewals of such contracts that renew on or after March 13, 2019.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 3022(b) of Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-91, July 22, 2019, 66 DCR 8497).
For temporary (90 days) amendment of this section, see § 3022(b) of Fiscal Year 2020 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2019 (D.C. Act 23-112, Sept. 4, 2019, 66 DCR 11964).
